page.title: 14 BEGUILDY SHEEP DOG TRIALS
page.content: Every year on the second week-end in May the Beguildy sheep-dog Trials are held on a field belonging to Pantycaragle Farm.On Friday evening from 7 p.m. until 9 p.m. the local farmers show how good they are. This is restricted to farmers living within ten miles of Beguildy.On Saturday the competition is open and competitors enter from as far afield as Anglesey in the north and Pembroke and Camarthen in the south.The course is a good one because it has a section of steep hillside and a level area in the foreground.The sheep used for the competition are usually Welsh Half_bred Hogs.
